author: AirPano VR
description:
Don't forget that this is 360 video: you can change the angle of view. 

A gentle beat of waves, snow white sand in addition to the sun, palms and azure blue sea - that's how a perfect picture of a tropical paradise looks like. 

If you enjoyed this video please like, share, comment, favorite, subscribe: https://goo.gl/NZMdaz 
We regularly publish new 360 videos of the most beautiful places on our planet!

360° photos and videos, stories of our shootings, articles and FAQ you can find on our website: http://AirPano.com

Nowadays you need extraordinary computer power for watching 8K 360° videos. If you have troubles with watching such videos, choose 4K or HD quality in the settings of your YouTube player. We hope that YouTube will find a solution for optimization this video format to make it watchable for common users.

Also here is the answer for a frequently asked question about true resolution of an 8K 360° video. Unlike standard videos, in a 360° video you can see only a part of or
title: Sunny Beach. VR Relaxation in 16K
